Summary: Yellow, round light flew over my car
divs: sighting detailswhile i was driving home last night, a round, yellow "ball of light" flew over my car, from back to front, in the sky. the object continued on a straight path until it seemed to just disappear. i got home (around the corner and down about 1\4 a block) and stood on the porch a few minutes to see if it returned. it did not. this happened very quickly, and it left me awestruck: it wasn't a star (it was about dusk and the stars weren't out yet), and it was much lower in the sky than a star. and it definitely wasn't an airplane. it was a round ball of light, traveling in a straight path.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Greenbrier
There were no other sightings in Greenbrier on or around April 1st 2012
